titleStmt.title: The Peoples friends, or, A discovery of many in the army who are yet faithfull to the people being a perfect relation of the late proceedings of the agents of divers regiments of horse : with the manner of their imprisonment, by some officers, with the petition of Col. Riches regiment to the generall for the release of their agents.

The Peoples friends, or, A discovery of many in the army who are yet faithfull to the people being a perfect relation of the late proceedings of the agents of divers regiments of horse : with the manner of their imprisonment, by some officers, with the petition of Col. Riches regiment to the generall for the release of their agents.
